member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.GetAllUsers
member.summary: Get all users in the system (Admin only)
member.remarks:
This endpoint retrieves all user profiles from the database.
**Authorization**: Requires Admin role
The JWT middleware automatically injects X-User-Role header from the token.
member.response: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid token, or insufficient permissions

member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.GetUserById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a specific user by their profile ID
member.remarks:
Retrieves a single user profile by their ID.
**Authorization**: Requires Admin or Client role
Sample request:
GET /api/user/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6

member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.GetUserByAuthId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get user profile by their authentication ID (path parameter)
member.param: The authentication service user ID (GUID from Identity)
member.remarks:
Retrieves a user profile using their auth service ID (from ASP.NET Identity). This is useful for linking authentication users with their profiles.
**Authorization**: Requires Admin or Client role
Sample request:
GET /api/user/auth/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6

member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.GetUserByAuthIdQuery(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get user profile by authentication ID (query parameter)
member.remarks:
Alternative endpoint to retrieve user by auth ID using a query parameter.
**Authorization**: Requires Admin or Client role
Sample request:
GET /api/user/by-auth?authId=3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6

member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.CreateUser(user_service.Model.AddUserDTO)
member.remarks:
Creates a new user profile in the system. This should be called AFTER creating the user in the auth service.
**Note**: This endpoint is typically called by the frontend after successful registration.
Sample request:
POST /api/user { "authId": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6", "username": "johndoe", "address": "123 Main St, City, Country" }

member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.UpdateUser(System.Guid,user_service.Model.AddUserDTO)
member.param: The user profile ID to update
member.remarks:
Updates user profile information such as username and address.
**Note**: The AuthId cannot be changed.
Sample request:
PUT /api/user/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6 { "authId": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6", "username": "johnupdated", "address": "456 New St, City, Country" }

member.name: M:user_service.Controllers.UserController.DeleteUser(System.Guid)
member.param: The user profile ID to delete
member.remarks:
Permanently deletes a user profile from the database.
**Authorization**: Requires Admin role
**Important**: This only deletes the profile. The auth service user should be deleted separately or use the composite delete endpoint in the frontend api-service.
Sample request:
DELETE /api/user/3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6
